tagline: BNDS class website for AP Computer Science A, Section 3
body:
# AP Computer Science A, Section 3
---
+ *Course Title:* AP Comp Sci A
+ *Section Number:* 3
+ *Meeting Place:* Room L211
+ *Instructor:* Mr. Alwin Tareen
+ *Course Website:* <http://altareen.github.io/apcompsci3>
+ *Grading Website:* <http://www.engradepro.com>
+ *Academic Assistance:* Mon - Fri, 4:20PM, Room L211

## Course Description:
This course will provide a comprehensive study of programming syntax,
algorithms and data structures. Students will be expected to study and
master a sufficient amount of material to perform well on the AP
Computer Science A exam.

The content will include, but not be limited to, the following topics:
+ Java language syntax
+ Defining variables and arithmetic expressions
+ Introduction to classes and object-oriented programming
+ Conditionals and looping
+ The `String` class
+ The `ArrayList` class
+ Creating, declaring and initializing arrays
+ Searching and sorting arrays
+ Classes, inheritance and interfaces
+ Recursion

## Grade Weighting:
+ Homework: 25%
+ Quizzes: 25%
+ Tests: 50%

# Homework Assignments
---
+ **Homework 1:** Due Monday, September 14, 2015
+ Compose an essay, *Why is programming important?*

---

+ **Homework 2:** Due Thursday, September 17, 2015
+ Write a simple Java program with integers.

---
